Posts.Content: HI Linda, I am glad you are seeking information and getting educated about your condition, but unless the persons replying to you are educated medical professionals, I would caution at taking anyone at their word.  Always get a second opinion and listen to the medical professionals. They live in this space and there is a reason why they went to school 10-15 years longer than the rest of us.
Posts.Title: stereotactic or conventional radiation??
